reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: Donna e Disabilita. Valorizzazione della donna nella prevenzione e presa in carico della persona con disabilita verso l'autonomia

description.narrative: Il progetto mira a rafforzare i diritti e il ruolo sociale della donna, con particolare riguardo a donne con disabilità
The project aims to strengthen the rights and the social role of women, with particular regard to women with disabilities

participating-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development
AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development
OVCI - ORGANISMO DI VOLONTARIATO PER LA COOPERAZIONE INTERNAZIONALE ONG/ON

organisation.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

sector.narrative: Women's rights organisations and movements, and government institutions

tag.narrative: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status

By 2030, ensure universal access to sexual and reproductive health-care services, including for family planning, information and education, and the integration of reproductive health into national strategies and programmes
Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages
Reduce inequality within and among countries

policy-marker.narrative: Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn and Child Health (RMNCH)
